# Load and Clean Data

```{r}
finalTrait_dat <- read.table("~/Documents/projects/shade_house_experiment/data/data_rda_leland.csv", header=TRUE, sep=",", strip.white=TRUE)
```

```{r}

allTrait <-  
    finalTrait_dat %>%
    dplyr::select(spcode, treatment, nfixer, init_height, totalbiom, above_biom,
                  whole_leaf_dry_weight, stem_dry_weight, amax, gs, wue, 
                  d13c, sla_cm2_g, totalleafmass_Nmass, rgr, agr)


# Scale data
allTrait_scaled <- allTrait
allTrait_scaled[,c(9:14)] <- scale(allTrait_scaled[,c(9:14)])
```



# PCA 

```{r}
PCAfinalTraits <- princomp(allTrait_scaled[,c(9:14)])
```

```{r}
#Extract loadings
PCAfinalTraits$loadings 
```

```{r}
PCAscores <- scores(PCAfinalTraits)
```

```{r}

fviz_pca(PCAfinalTraits)
```


# Data for PCA regression 
```{r}
allTrait_scaled_forReg <- allTrait
```

## Pull out PC axes and add to trait/growth data frame
```{r}
allTrait_scaled_forReg$PC1 <- PCAscores[,1]
allTrait_scaled_forReg$PC2 <- PCAscores[,2]
allTrait_scaled_forReg$PC3 <- PCAscores[,3]
```

# Model used 

$$response\sim treatment*fixer\ + initial\ height\ + random(1|specie)$$

# Perform regression 

__Do PCs predict AGR?__
```{r}
 
# fit treatment/nfixer interactions separately
PCmod_agr_bothPC<- lmer(agr ~ treatment * PC1 +
                              nfixer * PC1 +
                              treatment * PC2 +
                              nfixer * PC2 +
                              init_height + (1|spcode), 
                        data = allTrait_scaled_forReg)

```

```{r}
# fit three-way interaction
PCmod_agr_bothPC_3xItxn <- lmer(agr ~ treatment * nfixer* PC1+
                                      treatment * nfixer* PC2 +
                                      init_height + (1|spcode),
                                data = allTrait_scaled_forReg)
```

## Model comparision 
```{r}
# check two-way vs. three-way interaction models (shows that two-way is way better, more negative AICc -- include in methods)
AICc(PCmod_agr_bothPC, PCmod_agr_bothPC_3xItxn)
```

## Check Model assumptions 

```{r}
#check model assumptions with DHARMa -- could be worse... passes all tests so just go with it. 
simulationOutput <- simulateResiduals(fittedModel = PCmod_agr_bothPC)
plotQQunif(simulationOutput) 
```

# Results

### AIC, Rm2 and Rc2

```{r}

# model R2
r2(PCmod_agr_bothPC)

#AIC model
AIC(PCmod_agr_bothPC)

```




```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# ANOVA -- PC1 X Treatment effect significant (chi-sq = 29.25, P <0.001) 
Anova(PCmod_agr_bothPC, type = "III",test="F") %>% 
  kable()
```


```{r}
# pull out PCA loadings again
PCAfinalTraits$loadings
```
# Plot

```{r}
# compare slopes of lines for treatment X PC1 iteraction
emtrends(PCmod_agr_bothPC, pairwise ~ treatment, var = "PC1")

```



```{r}
# plot that shit
cbbPalette <- c("#F0E442", "#009E73", "#56B4E9", "#0072B2")

PC1_predict <- ggpredict(PCmod_agr_bothPC, terms = c("PC1", "treatment"))

(PC1_AGR_fig <- ggplot(PC1_predict, aes(x, predicted, colour = group)) + 
                      geom_line()+
                      ylab("AGR")+
                      xlab("PC1")+ 
                      theme_classic()+
                      scale_color_manual(values= cbbPalette,
                                        labels=c("ambient", "nutrients", 
                                                  "water", "nutrients + water")
                                        ) +
                      geom_line(size=1))


```
